SKT_FIRST.name: Swift Chain
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\n火傷の持続ターン+1ターン

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: <color=#FFBF00>強化攻撃</color>\nダメージUP\n解除不可能な火傷に変更

description: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000095_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 공격 후 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color>동안 지속되는 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Hestia's Cheer
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Increases Attack by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.\n\n(Triggered Effect) After using <color=#28d9ed>Swift Chain</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Argo Vesta</color>, grants <color=#28d9ed>Grace of the Virgin Goddess</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) Increases Attack by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000095_2_1]</color>.\n\n(Triggered Effect) After using <color=#28d9ed>Swift Chain</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Argo Vesta</color>, grants <color=#28d9ed>Grace of the Virgin Goddess</color>.

5: Adds Unable to Counterattack / Revenge / Agile Response
5_jp: 反撃、復讐、迅速対応発動不可追加
5_kr: 반격, 복수, 신속 대응 불가 추가

SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 공격력이 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가합니다.\n\n(발동 효과) <color=#28d9ed>신속한 연계</color> 또는 <color=#28d9ed>아르고 베스타</color> 사용 후, <color=#28d9ed>처녀신의 은총</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)攻撃力が<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPする。\n\n(発動効果)<color=#28d9ed>【迅速な連携】</color>または<color=#28d9ed>【アルゴ・ウェスタ】</color>使用後、<color=#28d9ed>【処女神の恩寵】</color>を付与する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Argo Vesta
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance each to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> 2 times on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000095_3_1]</color> chance toÂ grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000095_3_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000095_3_1]</color> chance each to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> 2 times on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000095_3_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 증가시킨 후, 적 전체를 공격합니다.\n공격 후 대상 전체에게 각각 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 지속되는 해제 불가능한 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 2회 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>をUPした後、敵全体にダメージを与える。\n攻撃後、対象全体にそれぞれ<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で解除不可能な<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>2個を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> once on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. (Ignores the target's Resilience)\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> once on the enemy for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. (Ignores the target's Resilience)
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color>Â once on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000095_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>. (Ignores the target's Resilience)\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> once on the enemy for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000095_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>. (Ignores the target's Resilience)

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 해제 불가능한 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 1회 부여합니다. (대상의 효과 저항 무시)\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 적에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 해제 불가능한 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 1회 부여합니다. (대상의 효과 저항 무시)
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、敵全体に解除不可能な<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。(対象の効果抵抗無視)\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、敵に解除不可能な<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1</color>ターンの間付与する。(対象の効果抵抗無視)
